Description: Limestone stela; incised Coptic text; traces of red paint.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Badari, el-, probably from area 5500 (Brunton 1930)
Bibliographic references: Brunton 1930 / Qau and Badari III (pl. LVI or VII) (?)
Tudor 2011 / Christian Funerary Stelae of the Byzantine and Arab Periods from Egypt
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
